channel.title: Cyber Insurance on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Cyber Insurance on Open Security Summit

item.title: Cyber Insurance - Round Table
item.description: Round table by multiple industry experts and players on how to improve the current state of Cyber Insurance

item.title: How can OWASP and OSS help with Cyber Insurance
item.description: OWASP and OSS (Open Security Summit) community sit at the center of a large community that has all the players and resources required to find good solutions

item.title: Maturity Model for Cyber Insurance
item.description: Use the Maturity Model created by the Owasp SAMM project to create a first pass a standard way to review Cyber Insurance

item.title: Risk Dashboard - Cyber Insurance
item.description: Creation of a Risk Dashboard for the multiple areas of Cyber Insurance

item.title: Wardley Map - Cyber Insurance
item.description: User session to create several Wardley Maps for the Cyber Insurance industry (and its past, present and future)
